guide.vocab_info: Shows total words, favorites, wrong words, and wrong counts

dialog.help_content:
You can select vocabularies to study or manage them.

üìÅ CSV Data Format
‚Ä¢ Must be CSV file format
‚Ä¢ Required columns: TargetVoca, ReferenceVoca
‚Ä¢ Optional columns: POS, Type, TargetPronunciation, TargetDesc, ReferenceDesc, TargetEx, ReferenceEx, Favorites

üéØ Column Description
‚Ä¢ TargetVoca: Language to learn (e.g., ÏÇ¨Í≥º)
‚Ä¢ ReferenceVoca: Language you understand (e.g., apple)
‚Ä¢ POS: Part of speech (e.g., noun, verb, adjective)
‚Ä¢ Type: Word type (e.g., general, important, difficult)
‚Ä¢ TargetPronunciation: Pronunciation guide (e.g., /saÀê.…°wa/)
‚Ä¢ TargetDesc: Additional description in learning language
‚Ä¢ ReferenceDesc: Additional description in understanding language
‚Ä¢ TargetEx: Example sentence in learning language (e.g., ÎÇòÎäî ÏÇ¨Í≥ºÎ•º Î®πÎäîÎã§)
‚Ä¢ ReferenceEx: Example sentence in understanding language (e.g., I eat an apple)
‚Ä¢ Favorites: Favorite status (true/false)

üí° Language Classification Rules
‚Ä¢ Target related: Input the language to learn
‚Ä¢ Reference related: Input your native language or understandable language

üìã Features
‚Ä¢ Single Select: Select only one vocabulary
‚Ä¢ Multi Select: Select multiple vocabularies together
‚Ä¢ Select All/Unselect All: Select/unselect all vocabularies at once
‚Ä¢ Delete: Completely delete selected vocabularies
‚Ä¢ Export: Export selected vocabularies to CSV files
dialog.delete_confirm_message:
Do you want to delete the selected {count} vocabularies?
This action cannot be undone.
dialog.reset_wrong_counts_message: Do you want to reset all wrong counts of the selected {count} vocabularies to 0?
dialog.reset_wrong_counts_success: Wrong counts have been successfully reset.
dialog.reset_favorites_message: Do you want to unset all favorites of the selected {count} vocabularies?

errors.no_vocab_selected_message: Please select a vocabulary first to start studying.
errors.no_words_found_message: No words found matching the selected criteria. Please adjust the filters.
errors.no_favorites_found_message: No words are set as favorites.
errors.error_delete_vocabulary: An error occurred while deleting vocabulary: {error}
errors.error_reset_wrong_counts: An error occurred while resetting wrong counts: {error}
errors.error_reset_favorites: An error occurred while resetting favorites: {error}
